description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国共产党河北省委员会书记、中共中央政法委员会秘书长等职。2015年因涉嫌严重违纪违法接受调查，2017年以受贿罪被判处有期徒刑十五年。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Communist Party Secretary of Hebei and Secretary-General of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. In 2015, he was investigated for serious violations of discipline and law, and in 2017 was sentenced to fifteen years in prison for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。周本顺在中央政法委任职期间是其直接下属。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission. Zhou Benshun was his direct subordinate during his tenure at the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，接替周永康担任中共中央政法委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Zhou Yongkang as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，曾到河北省参加省委常委班子专题民主生活会，会上周本顺接受了批评。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. He attended a special democratic life meeting of the Hebei Provincial Party Standing Committee, where Zhou Benshun received criticism.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在周本顺担任中共河北省委书记期间任河北省省长，是其副手。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Governor of Hebei when Zhou Benshun was the Party Secretary of Hebei, acting as his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 原湖南省邵阳市黑社会性质组织头目，在周本顺担任湖南省公安厅厅长期间被查办。
description.en: Former leader of a mafia-style organization in Shaoyang, Hunan, who was investigated and prosecuted while Zhou Benshun was the director of the Hunan Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Zhou Benshun.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺的儿子，因涉嫌经济犯罪被调查。
description.en: Son of Zhou Benshun, investigated for suspected economic crimes.

description.zh-cn: 2012年3月18日发生于北京市的一起致命车祸，死者为时任中共中央办公厅主任令计划之子令谷。据报道，周本顺曾参与掩盖此事件。
description.en: A fatal car crash that occurred in Beijing on March 18, 2012, involving Ling Gu, son of the then-Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, Ling Jihua. Zhou Benshun was reportedly involved in covering up the incident.

nodes.id: 党的群众路线教育实践活动

zh-cn: 党的群众路线教育实践活动

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党自2013年起在全党范围内开展的一项政治运动。在此活动期间，时任河北省委书记周本顺在一次专题民主生活会上进行了自我批评。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the Communist Party of China across the entire party starting in 2013. During this campaign, then-Hebei Party Secretary Zhou Benshun conducted self-criticism at a special democratic life meeting.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局于2012年12月4日提出的关于改进工作作风、密切联系群众的八项规定。据报道，周本顺曾对此表达不满。
description.en: Eight regulations proposed by the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee on December 4, 2012, concerning improving work style and maintaining close ties with the masses. Zhou Benshun reportedly expressed dissatisfaction with these regulations.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导和管理全国政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal affairs nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在河北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hebei Province.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关，负责调查周本顺的违纪违法问题。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China, responsible for investigating Zhou Benshun's violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 位于福建省厦门市的中华人民共和国中级人民法院，负责一审判决周本顺受贿案。
description.en: An Intermediate People's Court of the People's Republic of China located in Xiamen, Fujian, which tried and sentenced Zhou Benshun in the first instance for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺的母校之一，后并入吉林大学。
description.en: One of Zhou Benshun's alma maters, later merged into Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺的母校之一，在此获得工学硕士和管理学博士学位。
description.en: One of Zhou Benshun's alma maters, where he obtained a Master of Engineering and a Ph.D. in Management.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺的母校之一，在此获得法学博士学位。
description.en: One of Zhou Benshun's alma maters, where he obtained a Ph.D. in Law.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省人民政府主管全省公安工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Hunan Provincial People's Government in charge of public security work throughout the province.

zh-cn: 中国共产党邵阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在邵阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shaoyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省怀化市下辖的县，是周本顺的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Huaihua City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zhou Benshun.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺于1971年9月加入中国共产党，2015年10月16日因严重违纪违法被开除党籍。
description.en: Zhou Benshun joined the Communist Party of China in September 1971 and was expelled on October 16, 2015, for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺长期担任时任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记周永康的秘书，是其直接下属。
description.en: Zhou Benshun served for a long time as the secretary to Zhou Yongkang, who was then a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, making him his direct subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 周本顺在担任中央政法委秘书长期间，向时任书记孟建柱汇报工作。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary-General of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, Zhou Benshun reported to the then-Secretary Meng Jianzhu.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2015年7月24日，中共中央纪委宣布对周本顺涉嫌严重违纪违法问题进行组织调查。
description.en: On July 24, 2015, the CPC Central Commission for Discipline Inspection announced an investigation into Zhou Benshun for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 2017年2月15日，厦门市中级人民法院以受贿罪一审判处周本顺有期徒刑十五年。
description.en: On February 15, 2017, the Xiamen Intermediate People's Court sentenced Zhou Benshun to fifteen years in prison for bribery in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 据香港媒体引述消息称，周本顺在令谷车祸后，参与篡改死伤者身份信息以掩盖事件真相。
description.en: According to Hong Kong media reports citing sources, Zhou Benshun participated in altering the identity information of the deceased and injured to cover up the truth of the incident after the Ling Gu car crash.

description.zh-cn: 在担任湖南省公安厅厅长期间，周本顺亲自组织侦办了邵阳市黑社会头目姚志宏（小红宝）案，并将其团伙摧毁。
description.en: During his tenure as the Director of the Hunan Provincial Public Security Department, Zhou Benshun personally organized the investigation of the case of Shaoyang's gang leader Yao Zhihong (Xiao Hongbao) and dismantled his organization.

description.zh-cn: 据中纪委办案人员透露，周本顺在调任河北后多次在公开场合对“中央八项规定”表达不满，认为规定抓得太细太严。
description.en: According to CCDI investigators, after his transfer to Hebei, Zhou Benshun publicly expressed dissatisfaction with the 'Eight-point Regulation' on multiple occasions, believing the rules were too detailed and strict.

relationships.source: 党的群众路线教育实践活动

description.zh-cn: 在该政治活动期间，中共中央总书记习近平到河北参加专题民主生活会，推动了周本顺及河北省委常委班子进行批评与自我批评。
description.en: During this political campaign, CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping attended a special democratic life meeting in Hebei, which prompted Zhou Benshun and the Hebei Provincial Party Standing Committee to engage in criticism and self-criticism.

description.zh-cn: 2013年9月23日，习近平抵达河北，与时任省委书记周本顺谈话，并参加了河北省委常委班子专题民主生活会。
description.en: On September 23, 2013, Xi Jinping arrived in Hebei, spoke with then-Provincial Party Secretary Zhou Benshun, and attended the special democratic life meeting of the Hebei Provincial Party Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在周本顺担任中共河北省委书记期间，张庆伟任省委副书记、省长，是其主要副手。
description.en: While Zhou Benshun was the Party Secretary of Hebei, Zhang Qingwei served as Deputy Party Secretary and Governor, acting as his main deputy.
